statements: SELECT * FROM customer_behavior WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customer_behavior WHERE purchase_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date FROM customer_behavior ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customer_behavior WHERE purchase_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customer_behavior WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customer_behavior WHERE purchase_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;

SELECT customer_id, customer_name, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM customer_behavior WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC, customer_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_behavior WHERE purchase_date > '2022-06-30' AND customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customer_behavior WHERE customer_name LIKE '%son%' OR purchase_amount < 500 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC LIMIT 8;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 100;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, total_amount FROM customers c INNER JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.total_amount < 500 ORDER BY customer_name ASC, purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL AND email IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customer_behavior WHERE purchase_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customer_behavior WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaign WHERE start_date <= '2022-07-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, target_audience FROM marketing_campaign WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_behavior WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_behavior WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT c.campaign_name, cr.conversion_status FROM marketing_campaign c JOIN campaign_results cr ON c.campaign_id = cr.campaign_id
SELECT cr.customer_id, cr.conversion_status FROM campaign_results cr JOIN customer_behavior cb ON cr.customer_id = cb.customer_id ORDER BY cb.purchase_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM customers LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE join_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email_address, join_date FROM customers ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC, join_date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_name, email_address, join_date FROM customers WHERE join_date >= '2020-01-01' AND join_date <= '2021-12-31'

SELECT customer_name, email_address, orders.order_date, total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' OR category = 'Clothing' ORDER BY category, price DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget, COUNT(*) AS num_orders FROM marketing_campaigns LEFT JOIN orders ON marketing_campaigns.campaign_id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY campaign_name, start_date, budget ORDER BY num_orders DESC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT purchase_id, product_name, price FROM purchases;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE birthdate < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customers INNER JOIN feedback ON customers.customer_id = feedback.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_name, birthdate FROM customers WHERE birthdate >= '1990-01-01' AND birthdate <= '2000-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, email, purchase_date, product_name, price FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2023-01-01';
